text: All Hope Is Gone is the fourth studio album by American metal band Slipknot. All Hope Is Gone was released on August 20, 2008. The album was released through Roadrunner Records. The album featured the singles "Psychosocial" and "All Hope Is Gone". == Track listing == # ".execute." – 1:49 # "Gematria (The Killing Name)" – 6:01 # "Sulfur" – 4:37 # "Psychosocial" – 4:43 # "Dead Memories" – 4:28 # "Vendetta" – 5:15 # "Butcher's Hook" – 4:14 # "Gehenna" – 6:53 # "This Cold Black" – 4:40 # "Wherein Lies Continue" – 5:36 # "Snuff" – 4:36 # "All Hope Is Gone" – 4:44 Category:2008 albums Category:Slipknot albums Category:Heavy metal albums Category:Nu metal albums Category:Roadrunner Records albums
title: All Hope Is Gone
